text.tspan: Years a country was an European overseas colony
Total number of years current countries have been colonized from overseas, by the United Kingdom, France,
Spain, Portugal, Netherlands, Germany, and Italy.
Years a country was an European overseas colony
Data source: Bastian Becker (2023); Our World in Data
